item.description:
HAPPY NEW YEAR!

As the New Year unfolds, we think about new intentions and/or re-commit to current ones. The great news is that being part of a LoA community, we can come together to help each other launch our rockets of desire with more exhilaration and greater momentum.

We certainly can have a little help from our friends (who believe in us), don't you?

Paula Parnagian, coach, consultant & BostonLoA member, guides us through self reflection, group wisdom and activities to help us get our year off to a running start towards achieving our 2010 resolutions.

It is our intention that you "launch off" the New Year inspired with:
- evidences of how great you are already as a deliberate "attractor",
- "aha" actions to take to accelerate reaching at least one of your intentions,
- uncovering derailing blocks and internalized messages that sabotage even your greatest efforts and
- connecting with an "accountability buddy" to support you.

******************************************************
About Paula Parnagian:
www.WorldViewServices.net
to contact Paula: PParnagian@WorldViewServices.net


Paula Parnagian is founder and President of World View Services, an organizational consulting firm specializing in diversity, conflict and change. Paula is a speaker, trainer, consultant, and author who has a passion for creating peaceful and prosperous environments, helping her clients get over it so that they can get on with it!

***************************************************************
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.
We usually provide handouts and have appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this and we very much appreciate your understanding and support!

**************************************************************
For parking and directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :
(1) Go here: http://lawofattractio...
(2) Sign in
(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Launching Your Rockets of Desire, with a Little Help from Your Friends
